title: Decision
description: A decision made on a proposal by a human steward or automated policy

proposal_id.description: The proposal_id this decision applies to

approved.description: Whether the proposal was approved (true) or denied (false)

reason.description: Explanation for the decision (e.g., auto-approved, human approved, human denied)

approver.description: Identifier of who or what made the decision

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the decision was made
